alert.note: Alert for Caroline (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 7:56PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Sussex and southeastern Caroline Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 756 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bridgeville to near Hurlock. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Seaford, Laurel, Federalsburg, Bridgeville, Blades and Bethel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for eastern Maryland.
